title: Imported coal-based power units told to operate at full capacity till Jun; fuel blending floor at 6%
description: The power ministry has instructed imported coal-based plants to operate at maximum capacity until June 2024 and mandated all generation units to import at least 6% of their fuel for blending. The move is in response to increasing electricity demand, insufficient domestic fuel supply, and lower hydro generation. The ministry has also extended the current directive for imported coal-based plants, which was set to end in October. Additionally, the requirement for blending imported coal at power generating units has been increased from 4% to meet the rising demand.
